title: Had to fight for it, but they finally did the right thing.
text:
Update: I finally received a chargeback. 

No sooner did I have money on my card than it was hit with a charge for 196.15. I opened a case stating that the charge was fraudulent and blocked payments to that merchant. The charge was still pending at the time I alerted you that it was a fraudulent charge. It could have easily been frozen at that time. I went down to the police station and filed a police report for it also. I also contacted Hellcase.com. The responded the next day with a letter stating they had closed the fraudulent account, but the bank would have to do the chargeback. That letter is attached I also contacted Etsy because that is the only place I had entered my account details. They deny any responsibility for the charges. I have subsequently closed my Etsy store because of this. The reason I am so upset with Revolut is because you could have taken a simple action and froze the transaction as I requested. Itâ€™s my account. Wouldnâ€™t I know if charges were fraudulent? The charges were still pending even after you wrote me back and said there was nothing you could do. Everyone at Revolt wants to make it my fault for entering my card information on Etsy. Who gets a card and never uses it? That is ludicrous. All you had to do is freeze the transaction and cancel my card.

title: Definitely the best bank
text: I am a Revolut user since many years, I donâ€™t usually write reviews on Apple Store but I have to say that Revolut is the best bank I ever seen.

title: Brian
text: Fantastic

title: Keep saying update app to order <18 card
text: I have updated the app, even unloaded and reloaded and still not able to order a card for my daughter! Keeps popping up a message saying I have to update cause my version didnâ€™t support the option!!??

title: Love the card and the delivery
text: Sad though because I canâ€™t reorder my daughters card that never arrived.. when I try it says I need to update my app which I do and have and it doesnâ€™t change to much about being able to reorder it â€¦ anyways besides that I have shared the app a couple timesâ€¦ we will see if I can order one for her eventually!

title: Great bank
text: I travel internationally, use the exchange, spend online and in stores, transfer funds, kids accounts, etc. This card works instantly with very little fees that you pay for the convenience of having all banking options in 1 place.

title: I love this app!
text: Itâ€™s perfect for anyone to send, they accept all currencies & itâ€™s super easy. Way better then PayPal thank you!

title: Interest
text: Why doesnâ€™t Revolut pay interest on money in peoples account like normal banks? Best keep substantial funds in a real bank account.

title: Finally a bank app in NL
text:
It is 20 years further than the rest Dutch bank apps. Love it! 

Sure it has many many thinga to improve. Wish the best!

title: Smooth but limited in some areas.
text: One of the best designed apps I have used. Easy to execute almost all banking functions. Only issue is that document upload can be cumbersome on mobile and the web/desktop portal provides near 0 functionality so you are forced to do it all on mobile.

title: Rocks!
text:
I just read some guy said this is the worst banking app ever.

I have used a lot of banking apps and this one is awesome! So many useful features. I have their prepaid credit card and it is the only card I use. This card does everything and then some. Far and away the most full featured banking app I have used. Usually, at restaurants I get the charge on my phone before the waiter returns to the table.

title: The application does not work.
text: I have tried several ways to deposit money into the account and it is impossible.

title: Perfect for travel abroad
text:
I love this card, Iâ€™ve used it for a travel abroad for the last three years. 
I can keep my local currency on it and usually had BPS and Euros on it too. Itâ€™s so easy, love it!

title: Very fast SEPA payment transfers. Live FX chart timely.
text: Arrives in minutes for transfers to bank accounts in Europe using SEPA transfer method. Need to be careful though when sending money because there is not many steps to check review your payment order when sending to someone already in your Payee List.

title: Banking in Common Sense
text:
Iâ€™ve been using Revolut since Iâ€™ve move to London and it helps me keep track of my bills in the UK and the States. Simple to use and I love my little custom card I got back in 2022. It keeps getting better with the updates and itâ€™s so nice to see a company grow. Keeps me money conscious and not anxious. 

Also love their spare change option, has helped me safe money in case things have gotten rough monetary wise and it has. 

10/10 recommend to anyone who travels a lot.

title: Big family fans
text: We have had a Revolut account for quite some time. They really leveled up with the under 18 accounts and the family sharing. I love the app for so many reasons. It is so easy to transfer money between my classic bank account as well as others on Revolut.  I like to track where my kids spend their moneyðŸ˜Š- love the pockets and the categorization of spending. My CS account doesnâ€™t track any spending via categorizations. It is crazy how behind the high street banks are!

title: Iâ€™m digging it!
text: So far, so good, I want to know how this bank does things, Iâ€™m curious, I do like the metal card. See if we can get some incentives!

title: What an app!
text: This is what a banking app should be - amazing UX, great features and amazingly low fees. Love it.

title: Astonishingly good
text: Simple, effective, perfect UI, low fees for payments and international transfers

title: Great app butâ€¦.
text: Please add support for Costa Rican Colones. Costa Rica is one of the most heavily visited places on earth for eco- tourism yet someone you cannot pay in colones. Similar apps such as wise offer this.
